title: Covid-19 live updates: India announces 100,000 new cases a day, as new wave of infections risks spinning out of control
content:
1. Covid-19 live updates: India announces 100,000 new cases a day, as new wave of infections risks spinning out of control  The Washington Post
  2. India's daily virus cases breach 100000  Reuters
  3. India reports new record of 103,558 daily Covid cases, as second wave and new lockdowns hit  CNN
  4. India: 93249 new coronavirus cases in the last 24 hours | Covid-19 Case | Latest Update  WION
  5. How dangerous is India’s ‘double mutant’ COVID-19 variant?  Al Jazeera English
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 科维德-19实时更新。印度宣布每天新增10万病例 新一轮感染潮有失控风险
科維德-19實時更新。印度宣佈每天新增10萬病例 新一輪感染潮有失控風險
Covid-19のライブアップデート。インドでは1日に10万人の新規感染者が発生していると発表され、新たな感染の波が制御不能に陥る危険性がある。
